text:
Hi, I’m Cheryl Cage here to discuss the AWS Global 
Security & Compliance Acceleration Program Bundles
or as we like to call them, GSCA Bundles.

Starting your compliance journey can be 
confusing, time-consuming, and costly.

When we talk to our customers pursuing 
their compliance requirements,

most customers need the help of multiple 
partners throughout the process.

Our focus is not only to help you build 
secure and capable workloads on AWS

but to also be able to adhere to 
the various compliance requirements
that are in scope for your workloads.

AWS’ GSCA Bundles streamline 
compliance implementation

by providing a collection of expert-vetted 
security and compliance partners

to provide a complete compliance 
solution from migration to certification.

Some key benefits of leveraging 
GSCA Bundles include:

Accelerating customer acquisition 
and shortening sales cycles,
allowing you to enter new markets faster.

Streamlining security and compliance 
requirements while reducing overhead and costs

Helping you avoid scaling issues and costly 
rebuilds later in your development timeline.

By doing this, integrating security
and compliance requirements

early into your infrastructure 
lowers the risk of vulnerabilities,
reducing the need for costly remediation efforts.
GSCA Bundles are available on AWS MarketPlace

to help you find the software and 
associated services you need

to meet your compliance requirements, 
simplifying procurement.
Let’s break down these end-to-end solutions:

Ensuring compliance with complex and 
rapidly changing regulations is challenging

without a true end-to-end 
compliance solution in the market.
Organizations need multiple vendors to

1) Collect evidence and 
generate compliance reports,
2) Support advisory services,
3) Migration support, implement technical controls

and remediate architecture 
with hands-on engineering,
4) Perform an audit, and
5) Penetration test of their system.

With dozens of vendors, partners, and engineering 
firms to choose from, the choices can be daunting.

The GSCA Bundles offered by our partners cover 
the entirety of the compliance framework journey

offering expert guidance from 
migration to certification.

By leveraging purpose-built AWS 
Partner services and solutions,

we can help you automate and accelerate 
the entire compliance journey.

GSCA Bundles include major industries, 
verticals, and segments globally
to help meet compliance standards including SOC 2,

FedRAMP, HITRUST, ISO 27001, 
Privacy and TISAX regulations
with more to be added.

Finding the right partners is the 
key to accelerating compliance.

GSCA Bundles provide solutions to 
streamline compliance processes,

improve efficiency, and reduce costs so 
you can focus on your business at hand.

Get started today with our GSCA Bundles
available on AWS Marketplace.
